summary.Title: Chief Project Officer – Pioneering EPCM projects at Everfuel
summary.JobHeadline: Chief Project Officer – Pioneering EPCM projects at Everfuel

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Chief Project Officer – Pioneering EPCM projects at Everfuel
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you ready to play a pivotal role in advancing hydrogen as the future of energy? Do you have the expertise to manage both complex project executions and the challenges of building large-scale hydrogen production facilities? All whilst keeping a strategic perspective and mastering project management? If so, you might be Everfuel’s first-ever Chief Project Officer!

Everfuel is a leading hydrogen company, committed to transforming the energy landscape through green hydrogen production. Their brand-new electrolysis facility in Fredericia will be the foundation for future hydrogen production facilities. As Chief Project Officer (CPO), you will ensure the next steps by leading the development of Everfuel’s own Engineering, Procurement, and Construction Management (EPCM) process.

Chief of projects
In this newly created role, you will take Everfuel’s ambitious plans and turn them into executable projects in the +100M EUR range. Your responsibility will be to oversee the project maturation and execution of large-scale hydrogen production facilities, from concept to completion, including bringing the project to investment decision in the Board of Directors. You are responsible to develop and execute the EPCM strategy, including the prioritization of inhouse vs. outsourced competencies. You ensure that every project runs on time, within budget, and to the highest safety and quality standards. You will build and lead the key project functions – Engineering, Procurement, Construction, and Power Substations. This while driving and securing alignment with Everfuel’s broader strategic goals and ensuring strong collaboration with the other functions in Everfuel.

As a core member of the executive team, you will influence top-level decisions, and lead projects that will shape the future of green energy, not just in Denmark but globally.

Your qualifications
You are an experienced leader with a strong track record in managing large-scale industrial projects – ideally in the renewable energy sector, process industry, oil and gas, or similar large-scale infrastructure projects. You have a degree in engineering, or a related field. An MBA or similar business qualification is an advantage, providing strategic and operational insights to drive success. You bring in-depth knowledge of EPCM processes, and thrive in dynamic, fast-paced environments where not two days are the same.

You are:

  • A decisive leader with exceptional communication and stakeholder management skills.
  • Strategic in your approach, but not afraid to roll up your sleeves and get involved in the details.
  • Experienced in managing multi-disciplinary teams and fostering collaboration across diverse functions.
  • Comfortable navigating complex challenges and driving solutions that keep projects on track.

Why Everfuel?
Joining Everfuel means becoming part of a mission-driven company at the forefront of the green energy transition. You become the first CPO in the forefront of a growing team, where it is up to you to create an inspiring working environment where both team competencies grow and individual team members shine. You will play a critical role in building the infrastructure that will power a sustainable future, all while working alongside a passionate team, committed to innovation and impact.

About Everfuel
Everfuel is a large scale develop, owner and operator of green hydrogen production projects. They develop green field projects and bring them into operation, while supplying green hydrogen throughout Europe. Green hydrogen is a 100% clean fuel produced from renewable energy sources and will play a key role in overcoming Europe's climate challenges. They are based at the Everfuel Farm in Høgild near Herning and in Fredericia, where they are building Europe's largest electrolysis plant to date and new attractive offices. As an employee at Everfuel, you get the opportunity to work in a dynamic company and they offer you:

  • A good work environment
  • Flexible working hours
  • Exciting work assignments
  • Opportunity to influence decisions

Are you ready to lead the way?
As Everfuel’s first-ever CPO, you will have the opportunity to not just oversee and manage complex projects, but also shape the very way Everfuel work – leaving a lasting legacy in a company, poised to revolutionize the energy industry. Apply now to join Everfuel as Chief Project Officer.

Application and contact
Please send your motivated CV as soon as possible to PRO&CO via the button “Søg stillingen” below. PRO&CO is handling the recruitment process for Everfuel.

We encourage everyone to apply regardless of gender, ethnicity, or religion. We process all applications with confidentiality, we carry out interviews on an ongoing basis.

Starting date: as soon as possible.

If you want to hear more about the position, please feel free to contact:
Kristian Reinevald – PRO&CO: +45 9660 3200.
